title: Azure Pipelines Quick FQR Guide
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Pipelines issues

requiredFields: Azure DevOps Type: Azure DevOps Services or Server/TFS
Azure DevOps Version: e.g. *2020 Server*, *2019 Server*
Agent Type: Self-hosted, Microsoft-hosted, VMSS, or MDP
Agent OS Type: Windows / Linux / macOS
Agent Pool Type: VMSS or MDP (specify if using a *vanilla* or *custom* image)
Pipeline History: Is this a new pipeline?
